org.apache.jcs.utils.struct
Class BoundedQueue

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jcs.utils.struct.BoundedQueue

public class BoundedQueue
extends java.lang.Object

This is a bounded queue. It only allows maxSize items.

Author:
Aaron Smuts

Constructor Summary

          Initialize the bounded queue.
